title: Pulled pork in the oven
ingredients: ['Dry rub', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 to 2 tablespoons onion granules, or to taste', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon black pepper', '75g brown sugar', 'Brine', '3 tablespoons dry seasoning rub', '2 litres water', '150g salt', '75g dark brown soft sugar', '2 bay leaves', '1.5kg pork tenderloin, marbled']
